system.description: The character's overwhelming momentum allows them to bowl through enemies when charging.
system.benefit: When the Character makes a Charge Action, they can ram right through anyone in their way by making an Opposed Strength Test vs each foe in their way (IE. Each foe their charge would take them past or through). Those that fail are knocked to the ground, once the character has tested to knock down those in their way they complete their charge and make attacks against their intended target. If the Opposed Strength Test is ever failed, stop the charge and resolve it against the enemy that it failed on.

rollConfig.description: Opposed Strength tests to knock down enemies in charge path

specialAbilities.name: Unstoppable Charge
specialAbilities.description: When charging, make Opposed Strength tests against each enemy in your path. Success knocks them prone. Continue until you fail a test or reach your target.
